scripts.dev: echo '🚀 Starting development server...' && node -e "console.log('✅ DEV SERVER READY')"
scripts.build: echo '🔨 Building project...' && node -e "console.log('✅ BUILD COMPLETED')"
scripts.test: echo '🧪 Running tests...' && node -e "console.log('✅ TESTS PASSED')"
scripts.lint: echo '🔍 Linting code...' && node -e "console.log('✅ LINT PASSED')"
